overview: An (Phuong Anh Dao) - Phat (Lien Binh Phat) has a sweet love relationship. From childhood to becoming young people, both have for each other closeness and pure, carefree affection that cannot be hidden.  Until the incident, An became a singer and fate pushed the couple to different choices, forcing them to separate. The sad frames like to signal storms in not only love but also their whole life.
title: Truyên Ngan
